import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function FilterTableItems() { const [userInp,setUserInp]=useState() useEffect(()=>{ filter() },[userInp]) const filter=()=>{ const table=document.querySelector('#table') const tbody=table.querySelectorAll('tbody') const rows=tbody.querySelectorAll('tr') } return (
setUserInp(e.target.value)} />
